import logo from './logo.svg'; import './inisecion.css'; import logo2 from './logo.png'; import React,{useState} from "react" import {useHistory} from "react-router-dom" const Inisecion=(props) =>{ const history = useHistory(); const [state, setstate] = useState({ correo: "", passwd: "" }) const click = () => { fetch("http://localhost:3001/login", { method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify(state) }).then(function (rest){return rest.json()}).then(function (json){ console.log(json); history.push("/App") }); } return (
